data.name: BSides Córdoba 2019
data.description: BSides Córdoba is a non-profit organization designed to advance the body of Information Security knowledge, by providing an annual, full-day, open forum for discussion and debate for security engineers and their affiliates. We produce a conference that is a source of education, collaboration, and co…
